text: Footloose is a 1984 American musical drama movie. It stars Kevin Bacon and was directed by Herbert Ross. Lori Singer, Dianne Wiest and John Lithgow are co- stars. It was made into a musical on Broadway in 1999. A movie remake came out in 2011. == Other websites == * Category:1984 musical movies Category:1984 romantic drama movies Category:1980s teen drama movies Category:1980s teen romance movies Category:American musical movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:American teen drama movies Category:American teen romance movies Category:Dance movies Category:1980s English-language movies Category:Movies directed by Herbert Ross Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Oklahoma
title: Footloose
